description: Try our easy to follow Avocado With Soft-Boiled Eggs And Avocado Jalapeno Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Avocado With Soft-Boiled Eggs And Avocado Jalapeno Salsa
name: Avocado with SoftBoiled Eggs and Avocado Jalapeno Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve remaining avocado, remove the seed and run a large spoon around between the flesh and the skin to release. Use a paring knife, thinly slice crossways then gently fan within the skin. Top each avocado half with half a boiled egg, spoon over salsa to taste and serve scattered with microherbs.
